room_title: Escape room "LIT" by Inferno Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Loved all the puzzles, very unique room!

room_title: Escape room "LIT" by Inferno Escape Room in Phoenix
review: This is Inferno's best room for enthusiasts and newbies alike. Bring your friends, there are a lot of puzzles to solve! A room full of humor and fun... this one would be particularly great for birthday parties, bachelorette parties, etc.

room_title: Escape room "LIT" by Inferno Escape Room in Phoenix
review: My family has done many escape rooms across the Southeast so we decided to try one in Phoenix...and this was one of our favorites! We did LIT and loved it. The room was linear and the clues made sense. It definitely wasn't easy- but not undoable. Great design and fun to play.

room_title: Escape room "LIT" by Inferno Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Lit was a great room! Our group had a fun time playing and laughed quite a bit. Still a challenging room! Love the storyline and added challenge to break INto the room. I would recommend highly recommend this room.

room_title: Escape room "LIT" by Inferno Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Lit is a must play! If you are looking for a fun, but challenging room- this is the one to play. Love the sense of humor throughout the game and the very unique puzzles. Best room!
